name: POGAdventure
description:
Join the Niji-Members on their Adventure!  Welcome to POG-Adventure!!

This is a free unofficial rogue-like fangame that is inspired by Risk of Rain franchise, Choose your niji-member to collect and hoard niji-items to survive an endless wave of corrupted niji-clones!

The Niji-Members 

(Note: Others are currently unavailable or coming soon! and stats are not final)

Luca Kaneshiro

A Mafia boss from the past who punches his way through the obstacles.
Always down for a fight.

Rosemi Lovelock

A rose maiden raised in a beautiful garden.

Finana Ryugu

A mermaid who spends her time with tropical fish in the sea of coral reefs.

The Niji-Items

*will add more in the next update*

Luca Coat - Increases base movement speed

Luca Hat - Increase attack speed

Pomu Headband - Increases base damage

Rosemi Bud -Increases Health Regeneration

Maps Atlantis

Disclaimers: This project was made while following  guidelines of Nijisanji Fanwork Guidelines(https://event.nijisanji.app/guidelines/en/). There is no monetization in this game. I am not affiliated with Nijisanji. in any way.

This game is currently for Windows PC only.
